author: Sean Humphrey
title: Northern lights visible in Connecticut Thursday night
text: CONNECTICUT, USA — Connecticut residents spotted[ northern lights](https://www.fox61.com/article/weather/forecast/hartford-new-haven-waterbury-weather-forecast-connecticut/520-cd57cf5f-9021-4c36-b4cf-240ec23a4557) Thursday evening, resulting from a [severe solar storm](https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/communities/aurora-dashboard-experimental). According to FOX61 Meteorologist Rachel Frank, Thursday's visibility of the aurora borealis is a product of plasma and charged particles launched from the Sun into the Earth's atmosphere, resulting from a geomagnetic storm. The aurora could best be seen in places away from city lights and with a view of the northern horizon. Long-exposure cameras also helped capture the lights. Viewers from towns across Connecticut submitted their photos of the aurora: Northern lights visible in Connecticut Thursday night The northern lights could also be seen from UConn: RELATED: --- Do you have a story idea or something on your mind you want to share? We want to hear from you! Email us at [newstips@fox61.com](mailto:newstips@fox61.com). HERE ARE MORE WAYS TO GET FOX61 NEWS Download the FOX61 News APP iTunes: Click [here](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fox61-ct-news-from-wtic/id1491063786?ls=1) to download Google Play: Click [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tribtv.wtic) to download Stream Live on ROKU: Add the channel from the [ROKU store](https://channelstore.roku.com/details/7e2fb7c097662263741d062e390d1c22/fox61-ct-news-from-wtic) or by searching FOX61. Stream Live on FIRE TV: Search ‘FOX61’ and click ‘Get’ to download.

author: By
title: Mystery solved: 120-year-old shipwreck finally found
text:
(TMX) – A shipwreck discovered by accident off the coast of Australia has solved a 120-year-old mystery, the New South Wales Ministry of Environment and Heritage announced in a news release this week.
The steamship SS Nemesis left Newcastle on July 9, 1904, and was transporting coal to Melbourne when it vanished in a storm with 32 people on board.
The ship was last seen “in distress in rough seas off Wollongong by another ship also caught in the storm,” NSW Heritage said.
In the following weeks, the bodies of Nemesis crew members washed ashore, along with debris from the 240-foot ship, but the wreck was never found – until now.
In 2022, Subsea Professional Marine Services was searching for lost cargo containers off the coast of Sydney when the company accidentally located the wreck of the SS Nemesis about 16 miles offshore at a depth of around 525 feet.
“It has been an absolute honor to have discovered this wreck which will now finally bring some closure to the families of its lost crew members,” said Ed Korber of Subsea Professional Marine Services. “Our marine and remote operated vehicle team have navigated difficult challenges to get the first incredible footage that has allowed Heritage NSW to confirm this was indeed the Nemesis wreck.”
NSW Heritage experts suspected it was the Nemesis, but confirmation was difficult so far out and so deep. The Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation, or CSIRO, captured additional underwater imagery to identify the ship and provide clues to its sinking.
“The loss of Nemesis has been described as one of Sydney’s most enduring maritime mysteries and has even been described by shipwreck researchers as the ‘holy grail’,” NSW Minister for Environment and Heritage Penny Sharpe said in a statement.
“Thanks to collaborative work with CSIRO and Subsea, using modern technology and historical records, Heritage NSW has been able to write the final chapter of SS Nemesis’ story,” Sharpe said. “Around 40 children lost their parents in this wreck, and I hope this discovery brings closure to families and friends connected to the ship who have never known its fate.”
Underwater imagery captured by CSIRO showed the iron-hulled Nemesis settled upright on a sand plain with significant damage to its bow and stern.
“Our technical team aboard CSIRO research vessel, RV Investigator, did an amazing job in mapping the entire site and capturing very clear vision of the wreck using one of our underwater camera systems,” said CSIRO Voyage Manager Jason Fazey. “Using RV Investigator’s advanced multibeam echosounders, we were able to create a high-resolution map of the entire wreck and measure key dimensions to aid in its identification.”
Investigators believe the ship sank after its engine became overwhelmed in the storm. When the Nemesis was hit by a large wave, it sank too quickly for lifeboats to be deployed. The ship was carrying crew members from Australia, the U.K., and Canada.
“With only 105 of the more than 200 shipwrecks off the NSW coast having been discovered, this is an important find,” said Minister Paul Scully, Member for Wollongong. “The discovery of the Nemesis shows why Wollongong continues to explore its history in what is a proud port city.”
Copyright 2024 TMX. All rights reserved.

author: Roberta Jansen
title: Brasileiros criam bateria leve e flexível de nanopartículas: quais seriam as vantagens na indústria?
text: Cientistas do Instituto de Pesquisas Energéticas e Nucleares ( Ipen ) desenvolveram uma bateria muito mais leve e flexível que as convencionais, tradicionalmente usadas em automóveis e na indústria. Para desenvolver um dispositivo com essas características, os cientistas trabalharam com nanopartículas de chumbo e carbono. Os resultados foram publicados na Journal of Energy Storage de março. Um pedido de patente do dispositivo já foi submetido ao Instituto Nacional de Propriedade Industrial ( Inpi ). Uma bateria menor, mais leve e flexível traz grandes vantagens sobre os concorrentes. Ela ocupa menos espaço e, portanto, poderá ser usada em aparelhos cada vez menores, sobretudo sendo flexível. O dispositivo também é mais estável, trazendo mais eficiência à corrente. Além disso, é mais seguro porque é imune a vazamentos -- que muitas vezes causam explosões. “Nosso protótipo substitui os tradicionais eletrodos metálicos de chumbo das baterias tradicionais por nanopartículas de chumbo fixadas em um tecido de carbono flexível, muito mais leve e condutor do que chumbo metálico”, explica o químico Almir Oliveira Neto, do Centro de Células a Combustível e Hidrogênio do Ipen, que liderou o projeto. Leia também Outra inovação do protótipo é o uso de um eletrólito sólido - uma membrana transportadora de prótons – no lugar do eletrólito líquido usado nas baterias de chumbo. Nas baterias usadas em carros elétricos, por exemplo, o eletrólito desempenha o papel de um elemento condutor de energia. A membrana feita com polímeros deu flexibilidade ao sistema e o tornou mais leve. Além disso, a bateria é menos propensa a vazamentos e, portanto, mais segura. A ausência de líquidos também previne a corrosão interna, prolongado a vida útil do sistema. O protótipo desenvolvido no Ipen tem 5 centímetros quadrados e 1,2 milímetro de espessura. Cada célula pesa apenas 0,73 grama e, em testes, teve a mesma eficiência energética de uma pilha de chumbo tradicional de 15 g. Ou seja, a nova bateria é vinte vezes mais leve e teve o seu tamanho reduzido em 90%. Os cientistas destacam ainda a estabilidade da nova bateria, ou seja, a sua capacidade de carregar e descarregar sem perder a tensão elétrica. Baterias de chumbo existem há 150 anos e são consideradas ainda hoje uma opção segura e de baixo custo. A desvantagem é que são pesadas e grandes, ocupando muito espaço. Uma bateria tradicional de chumbo pesa, em média, 14 quilos. Um modelo equivalente do novo dispositivo deve pesar, no máximo, dois quilos. Como o dispositivo proposto pelo Ipen é flexível, em um futuro próximo, essa característica pode permitir o desenvolvimento de dispositivos moldados em outros formatos ou até dobráveis, o que pode servir a eletrônicos portáteis, dispositivos médicos, sensores e até satélites. “Os estudos preliminares mostram que esse material possuí uma faixa muito grande de aplicação. Outros pesquisadores vão poder comprovar isso”, afirma Soares. “Eles vão perceber que, utilizando os materiais estudados, existe uma variedade de aplicações no ganho e no armazenamento de energia, não só em baterias, mas em materiais leves, que podem servir tanto para a indústria de defesa aeroespacial e automobilística quanto a indústria de eletroportáteis”, complementa o pesquisador. Os comentários são exclusivos para assinantes do Estadão.

author: world today news
title: Sweden returns the skulls looted from the grave to Finland - 2024-04-18 21:35:33 - World Today News
text:
The Swedish government has finally decided to return the skulls looted from Finnish graves back to Finland.
Some very old skeleton parts were found in an old cardboard box at the back of the main biology class at Tampere Lyceum. A complete skull was also found in the box. Stock photo. Merja Ojala
The Swedish government decided on Thursday that 82 skulls and other remains belonging to Finland will be returned to Finland, reports SVT.
Most of the skulls in question were looted from the graves located in Pälkäne, Rautalammi and Pielavede in 1873. With the help of the skulls, Swedish race researchers wanted to try to prove that the long-skulled Swedes were of a different origin than the short-skulled Finns.
The leading figure in the research was the father of Swedish race theory, professor Gustaf Retzius (1842–1919). According to one description, Retzius himself would have been holding a shovel digging open Finnish graves. According to Retzius, the Finns and Sami were mostly related to the Mongols, while the Swedes were a pure northern Germanic race.
Claimed back for years The skulls have been stored in the Karolinska Institute and have been demanded back to Finland since 2018. In 2019, the Karolinska Institute apologized for looting graves of Finnish skulls, but the return of the skulls has not progressed until this spring. In February, Iltalehti reported that Finland submitted an official request on the matter.
– In February, the Finnish Ministry of Education and Culture asked the Swedish government to return the skulls. Now, a few months later, we made a decision, so we have acted very quickly, Swedish Minister of Education Mats Persson said according to SVT.
#Sweden #returns #skulls #looted #grave #Finland

author: FE Online
title: Good governance: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan unveils new recruitment board for transparent hiring process in state's PSUs - Jobs and Career News | The Financial Express
text: Suggest a good headline for this: Kerala’s Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan inaugurated the Kerala Public Enterprises (Selection and Recruitment) Board, marking a significant step in transparent and efficient recruitment for public sector units (PSUs). The establishment, located at Vellayambalam, aims to streamline the selection process for capable candidates within state-run entities.According to news agency PTI, the CM highlighted the board’s objective to bolster the effectiveness of public sector institutions, starting with PSUs under the Department of Industries and Commerce. Furthermore, PSUs from other departments can also utilise the board’s services for recruitment.Vijayan emphasised the pivotal role of PSUs in industrial development, emphasising their significance alongside the private sector.A statement from State Industries Minister P Rajeev’s office emphasised that the board’s formation fulfills a commitment outlined in the ruling LDF’s manifesto. It’s designed to identify skilled individuals for PSU positions while ensuring transparency and adhering to reservation principles.Initially, the board will oversee the selection process for various roles in 20 public sector institutions under the Department of Industry and Commerce. Moreover, it has completed the selection of managing directors for 12 PSUs, with responsibilities extending to contractual appointments exceeding one year, the news agency further reported.The board has been entrusted with the selection for the appointment of managing directors in 22 public sector institutions and the selection process for the post of Managing Director in 12 PSUs has been completed.The board’s purview also extends to contractual appointments of more than one year in public sector institutions, PTI reported.In May, the government issued an order constituting a special recruitment board, and a five-member board has since come into existence. The chairman of the board is former Chief Secretary VP Joy.

author: Camryn Rabideau
title: Best Mops 2024 - Forbes Vetted
text:
While vacuums excel at picking up loose dirt, dust and debris from your floors, when it comes to tackling tough stains and scuff marks, the best mops are the ideal tool for the job. There are several types of mops that are popular today, including spray mops, spin mops and steam mops. However, for your everyday cleaning needs, our top recommendation is the O-Cedar EasyWring RinseClean Spin Mop , a user-friendly option that delivers a thorough clean on any flooring surface.
If you're questioning the necessity of a mop, especially if you vacuum regularly, experts say the answer is still yes: “If you have any sort of hard surface in your home for flooring, a mop is a must-have cleaning tool,” says Jessica Samson, cleaning expert for The Maids . “My favorite type of mop is a standard microfiber mop with a bucket that you can use on wet or dry surfaces. This makes it versatile to use on almost any kind of hard surface.”
Nevertheless, the most suitable mop for your home hinges on your cleaning requirements. In compact spaces, spray mops are frequently favored for their compactness and easy storage. Conversely, steam mops offer versatility by being effective on various surfaces, including glass and grout. For those seeking ultimate convenience, the best robot mops are available to handle the cleaning, efficiently scrubbing the floors while you enjoy a moment of relaxation.
Regardless of the mop style you seek, we’ve curated a selection of the best mops to help keep your home spick and span in 2024.
Best Mop Overall: O-Cedar EasyWring RinseClean Spin Mop Best Value Mop: Swiffer WetJet Spray Mop Best Mop For Hardwood Floors: Bona Hardwood Floor Premium Spray Mop Best Mop For Tile Floors: Black + Decker Steam Mop Best Steam Mop: Bissell PowerFresh Steam Mop Best Spin Mop: Libman Tornado Spin Mop System Best Robot Mop: Bissell SpinWave Pet Robot Best Oversized Mop: Microfiber Wholesale Store Professional Microfiber Mop Best Mop-Vacuum Combo: Tineco Floor ONE S3
Best Mop Overall A Popular Spin Mop With Clever Design Features
O-Cedar EasyWring RinseClean Microfiber Spin Mop & Bucket Buy From Amazon Type: Spin | Dimensions: 12.5 x 11.8 x 19.4 inches | Weight: 3.56 pounds | Mop head type: Reusable
The bestselling O-Cedar EasyWring RinseClean Spin Mop delivers a quick and easy clean, making it one of the most popular options on the market right now. This cleaning system includes a microfiber mop and bucket, featuring a unique two-tank system that keeps clean and dirty water separate, preventing the spread of dirt on your floors. To remove excess water from the mop head, a simple push on the foot pedal allows it to spin.
Plus, the entire system is user-friendly and intuitive. The microfiber head of the O-Cedar mop is triangular, facilitating deep cleaning in corners, and it can be conveniently tossed into the washing machine for hands-off maintenance. Although the mop initially comes with a single cleaning head, the brand offers replacement units for those who prefer having backups. The only drawback is that the mop heads are relatively small, which might require a bit more time for cleaning larger areas.
Pros:
Bucket system provides clean water for rinsing Foot pedal makes it easy to wring out mop Triangular mop head fits into corners easily Mop head is machine washable Cons:
The mop head is smaller than others Best Value Mop A Simple Spray Mop That’s Surprisingly Effective
Swiffer WetJet Spray Mop Starter Kit Buy From Amazon Type: Spray | Dimensions: 11 x 5 x 46 inches | Weight: 3.23 pounds | Mop head type: Disposable
If you’re looking for a lightweight, compact mop for quick and convenient use, the Swiffer WetJet is an excellent choice. This affordable spray mop is a popular choice for quick cleanups, as it doesn’t require any water or buckets for operation. Instead, it features a container filled with cleaning solution that attaches directly to the mop. With the push of a button, you can dispense the solution onto your floors for efficient mopping.
The WetJet uses disposable mopping pads that easily adhere to the mop head. These pads boast high absorbency and a built-in scrubbing strip enables you to tackle stains and dried-on messes. After cleaning, simply discard the pad, however, keep in mind that you'll need to purchase replacement pads (as well as cleaning solution), and this may become a bit costly if you mop frequently.
Pros:
Lightweight and highly portable Pads have a scrubbing strip to help remove tough stains Disposable mopping pads make for easy maintenance Cons:
Replacement pads can add up Best Mop For Hardwood Floors A Spray Mop With A Special Hardwood Cleaning Solution
Bona Hardwood Floor Premium Spray Mop Buy From Amazon Type: Spray | Dimensions: 4.5 x 16.56 x 51.1 inches | Weight: 3 pounds | Mop head type: Reusable
For homes featuring hardwood floors, the Bona Premium Spray Mop is one of the best options for preserving the wood's pristine appearance. This lightweight spray mop includes a specially formulated hardwood cleaning solution to keep your hardwood floors in top condition, and the cartridge is refillable, which helps to reduce plastic waste and decrease the cost of maintenance.
Equipped with a sizable 16-inch mop head, the Bona Spray Mop utilizes microfiber pads that effectively trap dirt while remaining gentle on hardwood surfaces. These pads are machine washable up to 500 times, and for added convenience, the brand offers multi-pack replacement pads if you prefer having extras on hand.
Pros:
Lightweight design with large mopping pad Comes with hardwood floor cleaner concentrate Cartridge is refillable to reduce waste Cons:
Spray nozzle can get clogged Best Mop For Tile Floors A Steam Mop That Includes A Grout-Cleaning Tool
Black+Decker Steam Mop Buy From Amazon Type: Steam | Dimensions: 12.8 x 7.3 x 25.4 inches | Weight: 8.5 pounds | Mop Head Type: Reusable
Cleaning tile floors, especially with recessed grout lines, can be challenging, but our research found that the Black+Decker Steam Mop is up for the task. While this versatile mop is designed for cleaning and sanitizing hard floors, it also transforms into a handheld steamer that’s equipped with a grout-cleaning brush for a thorough and deep clean. Additionally, the steam mop comes with a detail brush, squeegee and copper brush, making it a versatile tool for various cleaning tasks in your bathroom, kitchen and more.
As an added bonus, it’s effective in killing 99.9% of germs using steam alone, eliminating the need for additional cleaning solutions. Plus, it’s suitable for use on sealed stone, wood and laminate surfaces and with quick heat-up time of less than 30 seconds, it offers adjustable steam levels for different cleaning needs. Keep in mind that this model is corded, requiring proximity to an electrical outlet during operation.
Pros:
Converts from a mop to a handheld steamer Includes grout brush, as well as other attachments Heats up in less than 30 seconds Cons:
Corded design limits your range while cleaning Best Steam Mop A Powerful Steam Cleaner With Built-In Scent Discs
Bissell PowerFresh Steam Mop Buy From Amazon Type: Steam | Dimensions: 11.6 x 7.1 x 28.6 inches | Weight: 6.2 pounds | Mop Head Type: Reusable
The Bissell PowerFresh Steam Mop is a top-rated option for anyone who wants to clean without chemicals. It’s designed to clean and sanitize hard floors, killing 99.9% of germs and bacteria using hot steam alone. The mop comes with a soft microfiber pad and a more abrasive scrubbing pad, and it has a flip-down scrubbing tool that gets deep into grout lines and helps remove stubborn stains, as well.
The Bissell Steam Mop has three steam settings, and its 23-foot power cord provides enough range to clean most rooms. It also comes with two optional fragrance discs that you can insert into the mop to leave behind a refreshing scent as you clean.
Pros:
Cleans and sanitizes using just water Includes two reusable cleaning pads Flip-down scrubbing tool gets into grout lines Optional fragrance discs to leave behind a fresh scent Cons:
Water reservoir can be tricky to remove Best Spin Mop An Easy-To-Use Option With An Extra-Large Mop Head
Libman Tornado Spin Mop System Buy From Amazon Type: Spin | Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 53 inches | Weight: 5.44 pounds | Mop head type: Reusable
You can quickly clean large areas with the Libman Tornado Spin Mop, which has an extra-large microfiber head. This comprehensive mopping system includes both a mop and bucket, and unlike conventional spin mops where the bucket spins, the Tornado stands out as the mop itself spins to wring out water. All you have to do is simply unlock the lever on the mop's handle and press down. The spinning motion effectively squeezes out excess liquid.
Noteworthy design features include a generous 2-gallon water capacity, a telescoping mop pole that can extend up to 53 inches for a more comfortable user experience, a large handle and pour spout for easy emptying and a machine washable microfiber head.
Pros:
Large mop head covers more area Mop head spins to wring out liquid Pole extends up to 53 inches Cons:
Plastic mop handle isn’t the most sturdy Best Robot Mop An Autonomous Robot Mop That Will Scrub Your Floors
Bissell SpinWave Pet Robot Buy From Amazon Type: Robot | Dimensions: 12.25 x 12.25 x 3.25 inches | Weight: 13.62 pounds | Mop head type: Reusable
In our rigorous best robot mops testing, the Bissell SpinWave Robot came out on top as the most effective model. It features two rotating pads that effectively eliminate stains from various flooring types, employing a systematic back-and-forth pattern for a thorough clean. Notably, the robot autonomously avoids any carpeted areas during its operation. Simply fill its water tank, add a small amount of cleaning solution and let it take care of your floor cleaning needs.
For added versatility, the SpinWave Robot can be transformed into a robot vacuum by swapping out its water tank for a separate dustbin. While it can connect to the Bissell app on your phone, its smart features are more limited compared to other robot vacuums—primarily allowing you to start/stop the robot or create a cleaning schedule.
Pros:
Dual scrubbing pads are effective on tough stains Automatically avoids carpeting Doubles as a robot vacuum Cons:
Limited smart features Best Oversized Mop A Big Microfiber Mop To Clean Large Area
Microfiber Wholesale Store 18-Inch Professional Microfiber Mop Buy From Amazon Type: Flat | Dimensions: 18 x 1.8 x 41.2 inches | Weight: 1.95 pounds | Mop head type: Reusable
For extensive cleaning tasks, the Microfiber Wholesale Store Professional Microfiber Mop stands out with its expansive 18-inch head, enabling you to cover more area in each pass. Built for heavy-duty use, it features a durable metal handle that telescopes up to an impressive 72 inches, allowing you to adjust it to your preferred height. The mop comes complete with both wet and dry mopping pads crafted from soft microfiber, securely adhering to the mop for stability during use. With a 360-degree swiveling head, you can effortlessly maneuver around furniture and obstacles.
However, it's worth noting that a potential drawback of this mop is the need to remove the entire pad if you wish to refresh it mid-cleaning, as the extra-large size may not fit into most buckets.
Pros:
18-inch mop head makes it easy to clean large areas Includes pads for wet and dry mopping Sturdy metal handle Cons:
Harder to wring out than other mops Best Mop-Vacuum Combo A Cordless 2-In-1 Floor Cleaner
Tineco Floor ONE S3 Cordless Floor Cleaner Buy From Amazon Type: Vac-mop | Dimensions: 11.3 x 10 x 43.3 inches | Weight: 9.92 pounds | Mop head type: Reusable
Typically, most cleaning routines involve vacuuming before mopping to handle larger debris, but the Tineco Floor ONE S3 breaks this pattern as it combines both vacuuming and mopping functionalities in one unit. The popular mop-vacuum has a cordless design that’s easy to drive around on hard floors, and it simultaneously sucks up dirt and other debris while mopping with its spinning brushroll. The unit incorporates separate tanks for clean and dirty water, offering a runtime of up to 35 minutes per charge.
The self-propelled design ensures easy maneuvering and the LED display provides real-time information on cleaning status and runtime. Equipped with sensors, the mop-vacuum detects both wet and dry messes, automatically adjusting suction for optimal performance. Additionally, it features a self-cleaning cycle that washes the brushroll and flushes out inner hoses when the mopping task is complete.
Pros:
Vacuums and mop simultaneously Self-cleaning design automatically cleans roller Self-propelled for easy maneuvering Cons:
Notably more expensive than most other mops MORE FROM FORBES VETTED The Best Bassinets, After Extensive Testing By A Mom And Her Newborn By Alexandra Frost Contributor The Best Swimsuit Brands That Fit Every Style And Budget By Kari Molvar Forbes Staff Why Trust Forbes Vetted The Forbes Vetted team brings substantial expertise in researching, writing about and testing cleaning tools, including the best mops. Our reviews on cleaning tools include the best robot mops , best steam mops , best vacuums , best carpet cleaners and more.
In addition to relying on our own expertise while putting together this list, we also consulted with cleaning expert Jessica Samson from The Maids, who shared valuable insights for selecting the optimal mop for your home. Furthermore, the author of this article, Camryn Rabideau , is a product tester with hands-on experience using several of the featured mops. And the story was edited by Sholeen Damarwala , an experienced home and kitchen editor on the Forbes Vetted team.
How We Chose The Best Mops Drawing on insights from our experts, we focused on identifying key features in the selection of the best mops for this list. Recognizing that mopping can be a laborious task, our priority was to highlight mops that streamline the process, offering features such as hands-free wringing, on-board cleaning solutions and/or machine-washable mop heads. We sought out products versatile enough for various floor types, assessing each pick based on criteria such as ease of use, special features and maintenance costs.

author: tio.ch
title: Scatta lo sciopero generale, l'Italia si ferma
text:
Lo stop è di 8 ore e interessa quasi tutti i settori privati e pubblici. Escluso solo il trasporto ferroviario
ROMA - Al via in Italia lo sciopero generale, proclamato dai sindacati Cgil e Uil, per chiedere di cambiare la manovra di bilancio del governo, aumentare salari e pensioni, finanziare sanità, istruzione, servizi pubblici e investire nelle politiche industriali.
Lo stop è di 8 ore per tutti i settori privati e pubblici, a eccezione dei trasporti dove è di 4 ore: per bus e metro dalle 9 alle 13, così come per il trasporto marittimo, per i voli dalle 10 alle 14. Esclusi dallo stop i treni.
La mobilitazione si articolerà in 43 piazze su tutto il territorio nazionale, indetta per contrastare "le scelte ingiuste e sbagliate del governo".
I segretari generali, Maurizio Landini (Cgil) e Pierpaolo Bombardieri (Uil) concluderanno rispettivamente le manifestazioni di Bologna e Napoli. In contemporanea, in alcune città, i comizi saranno conclusi dai dirigenti sindacali delle segreterie nazionali di Cgil e Uil.
«Vogliamo rivoltare il paese come un guanto»
"Noi vogliamo rivoltare come un guanto questo paese e per farlo c'è bisogno della partecipazione di tutte le persone": lo ha detto il segretario del sindacato Cgil Maurizio Landini a Bologna a margine della manifestazione per lo sciopero nazionale in corso in Italia.
"La rivolta sociale, per noi, significa proprio dire che ognuno di noi non deve voltarsi da un'altra parte di fronte alle ingiustizie, anzi, deve passare l'idea che il problema mio è il problema di tutti e che solo mettendoci insieme possiamo cambiare questa situazione", ha affermato il sindacalista. "È una giornata di mobilitazione come da tempo non si vedeva. Oggi inizia un percorso di mobilitazione per rivoltare come un guanto questo paese".
Gli ha fatto eco, da Napoli, Pierpaolo Bombardieri, segretario nazionale della Uil, il secondo sindacato che ha organizzato lo sciopero, che ha attaccato il vicepresidente del consiglio dei ministri Matteo Salvini. "Mi pare che Salvini si sia sprecato in insulti, ci ha detto che siamo degli estremisti, ci ha detto che siamo ridicoli, e quegli insulti sono forse rivolti a queste persone che riempiono 40 piazze in questo splendido paese, che chiedono soltanto di essere ascoltati, di modificare le scelte che sono state fatte finora".
"Intanto mi pare che non tutto il governo abbia fatto le stesse valutazioni", ha aggiunto il 60enne. "Questa è una protesta pacifica, democratica, è strano che un vicepresidente del consiglio attacchi in questo modo un diritto riconosciuto dalla Costituzione. Noi rispondiamo con queste piazze, rispondiamo con la democrazia, con manifestazioni pacifiche, democratiche, che chiedono cambiamenti".

author: Armando Medina
title: La plataforma de agricultores Decaleón logra más de 400 socios en apenas un día
text: La plataforma de agricultores Decaleón logra más de 400 socios en apenas un día El colectivo, además de las necesidades específicas del campo, defiende también el entorno rural de la provincia Declaración La plataforma Defensa del Campo Leonés (Decaleón), que congrega a los agricultores y ganaderos de la provincia que durante las dos últimas semanas se vienen movilizando, logra más de 400 socios en apenas un día. Y es que la plataforma se constituyó de manera oficial este miércoles por la noche en una reunión que tuvo lugar en la casa de cultura de Riego de la Vega, aunque por la mañana hubo otra en Valderas. Días previos se llevaron a cabo otros encuentros en otras comarcas, aunque la recogida de adhesiones comenzó de manera formal el miércoles. Según queda reflejado en su acta de constitución, la plataforma se crea «con el fin de defender tanto la ganadería como la agricultura de León abarcando todas sus peculiaridades y formas, así como todo el entorno rural de León». En el acta se incide un poco más en esta idea general. Así el primer y segundo objetivos son la defensa de la agricultura y la ganadería leonesas, «en todas sus variedades, frente a normas, leyes e imposiciones tanto de autoridades locales, provinciales, estatales y europeas, que nos impidan mantener la rentabilidad de nuestras explotaciones». Pero la plataforma va más allá y no se queda solo en la defensa de la propia actividad agraria y ganadera sino que también en la de «nuestros entornos rurales dentro de la provincia, de la pérdida de servicios, actividades comerciales que dañas el campo de León, y todos aquellos agravios que pudieran producirse en los pueblos de León». Por otro lado el documento constituyente de Decaleón señala que los integrantes de la plataforma «quieren tener voz en los proyectos o actividades en las finalidades expuestas, para que se tenga en cuenta su opinión como parte interesada». También deja claro que aglutina a agricultores y ganaderos «sin intereses particulares y partidistas y, por supuesto, sin ánimo de lucro». Según se explicó en la reunión del miércoles por la noche en Riego, a la que asistieron cerca de 200 personas, la plataforma se dividirá por las distintas comarcas que componen la provincia. En cada una de ella se elegirán coordinadores que recabarán las necesidades y preocupación para ponerlas en común con los del resto de la provincia para tomar decisiones en común. Hasta el momento, como se ha señalado, en apenas un día se han apuntado ya unas 300 personas de manera presencial y otras cerca de 100 lo han hecho a través de correo electrónico. Además, los asistentes a cada una de las reuniones se han llevado impresos para informar a los agricultores y ganaderos de sus respectivos pueblos e invitarles a sumarse a la iniciativa. Así pues, el movimiento que surgió de manera espontánea a través de grupos de Whatsapp hace algo más de dos semanas como un grito del campo leonés ante el hartazgo general por la situación que está viviendo, y que ha sido capaz de forma independiente de congregar las mayores protestas del campo leonés que se recuerdan, ha visto la necesidad de organizarse de alguna manera para poder tomar decisiones. Así nació este miércoles la Plataforma Defensa del Campo Leonés, que ahora hecha a andar con gran aceptación del sector, según se desprende del número de apuntados.

author: John Valenti
title: Long Island weather forecast, heat advisory extended; thunderstorms could bring excessive rain
text: The combination of heat and humidity will make it feel like it's in the upper 90s, maybe even in the low 100s, the National Weather Service said.
